properties.areaDesc: Seul Choix Point to 5NM West of Mackinac Bridge
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 5 at 3:05AM EST until January 6 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 35 kt and highest waves around 5
feet expected.

* WHERE...Seul Choix Point to 5NM West of Mackinac Bridge.

* WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 4 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous highest waves
which could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM EST MONDAY
